Activity â€“ Calculate the Subnet and Wildcard Masks

Calculate the subnet mask and wildcard mask required to advertise the specified network address in OSPF. Type your answers in the fields provided. Click Check to verify your answers. Click Show Me to see the correct answer.

Click New Problem to continue the activity.
You have successfully calculated the subnet mask and wildcard mask for the specified network. Click New Problem to continue the activity.
You have not successfully calculated the subnet mask and wildcard mask for the specified network. Please click Show Me to see the correct answer. Click New Problem to continue the activity.
